course_description: Spring. Continuation of GER 301 in its thematic focus on the changing portrayal of love in German cultural narratives. Course materials include a variety of texts (prose, drama, essays, poetry, film). Introduces students to textual analysis and is designed to foster academic writing in German.
sections: Class Nbr: 1315, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: H. Maxim, Status: Open
